0.context: Aguada Fort Beautiful Ambiance Sightseeing in Goa is incomplete without a visit to Fort Aguada strategically situated at the estuary of the river Mandovi On the north side of the fort a rampart of laterite just into the bay to form a jetty between two small sandy coves This picturesque spot is known as Sinquerim Beach Location Fort Aguada Rd Aguada Fort Area Candolim Goa Timings AM PM all days of the week Built By Portuguese Houses The Central Jail and a 19th Century Lighthouse How To Reach The fort is located on the Road and can be easily reached by road Entry Fee No entry fee Must Read 26 Beach Resorts In Goa Planning your holiday in Goa but confused about what to do These Goa travel stories help you find your best trip ever Romance Beaches Churches Rahul Talks Of A Sizzling Honeymoon In Goa No wonder Goa is the Beach Capital of India Read More Iresh Lists The Most Romantic Experiences From His Goa Honeymoon Trip Dolphin spotting snorkeling boat rides top the list Read More Amit Shares His Experience Of An Unusual Romantic Tour Of Goa Pristine beaches backwaters Take me there now Read More Prasham Account Of A Goa Tour Proves That Goa Is More Than A Party Destination Adventure sightseeing beach tours and it does stop there Read More When In Goa Do What The Johars Did On Their Family Holiday Beach hopping cruising hiking through spice plantations more Read More Mahesh Kumar Shares A Travel Tale Of 17 Men In Goa Deltin Royale Casino cruise beaches churches more Read More See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE COM Visit Website
0.summary: Aguada Fort, located at the estuary of the Mandovi River in Candolim, Goa, is a must-visit site built by the Portuguese. It features a central jail and a 19th-century lighthouse. The fort's northern rampart forms a jetty between two sandy coves, known as Sinquerim Beach. Open daily from morning to evening with no entry fee, the fort is easily accessible by road. It's a picturesque spot ideal for sightseeing and experiencing Goa's historical ambiance. Nearby attractions and activities include beach resorts, dolphin spotting, snorkeling, and boat rides.

1.context: Chapora Fort For Selfie Lovers Popular for its history the Chapora Fort is one of the prime tourist attractions of Goa In recent years it shot to prominence after the Bollywood movie Dil Chahta Hai was shot here Perched on a prominent position one can get sweeping views of all directions from here This is one of the prime sightseeing places in Goa where you can enjoy a wonderful sight of the sea from up above Location Chapora Fort Rd Chapora Goa What s Special Dil Chahta hai has been shot here The fort offers picturesque views of the Chapora river uniting with the waters of the Arabian Sea Built By Adil Shah of Bijapur Nearby Attractions Vagator Beach and Anjuna Beach How To Reach The fort is and can be easily reached by road Entry Fee No entry fee
1.summary: Chapora Fort, a prime tourist attraction in Goa, gained prominence after being featured in the Bollywood movie 'Dil Chahta Hai.' Located on Chapora Fort Road, it offers sweeping views of the Chapora River merging with the Arabian Sea. Built by Adil Shah of Bijapur, the fort is easily accessible by road and is free to enter. Nearby attractions include Vagator Beach and Anjuna Beach, making it a popular spot for sightseeing and capturing picturesque views.

2.context: Terekhol Fort Serene Ambiance Fort Terekhol situated on the Terekhol River lies on the northern tip of Goa on a hillock overlooking the Arabian Sea In its courtyard is the church of St Anthony which makes it one of the best Goa tourist places The remains of the fort have now been converted into a hotel The fort overlooks Tiracol River and the sandy Keri beach offering captivating views Location Pernem Taluka Tiracol 403524 Built By Raja of Sawantwadi Viceroy Pedro Miguel de Almeida 17th century Houses The Chapel Of St Anthony Nearby Attractions Arambol Palolem Beach How To Reach Terekhol fort can be reached easily by hiring a taxi or an auto from any place in the north of Goa Entry Fee No entry fee Suggested Read 10 Romantic Beach Resorts In India
2.summary: Terekhol Fort, located on the northern tip of Goa on the Terekhol River, offers a serene ambiance and captivating views of the Arabian Sea. Built in the 17th century by the Raja of Sawantwadi and Viceroy Pedro Miguel de Almeida, the fort features the Chapel of St Anthony. Now converted into a hotel, it overlooks the Tiracol River and Keri Beach. Easily accessible by taxi or auto from northern Goa, the fort is free to enter. Nearby attractions include Arambol and Palolem Beach.

3.context: Reis Mogos Fort For History Lovers Ashwin Kumar for Wikipedia The construction of this fort was done by Alfonso de Noronha the Portuguese Viceroy in the year 1551 The fort was reconstructed in the year 1707 This fort served as a pivotal site by becoming a defensive wall when the Portuguese were at war with the Marathas in the year This fort is located at 7 kilometres from the Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand and lies on the banks of Mandovi Location Verem Bardez Goa Timings AM 5 PM all days of the week Built By Alfonso de Noronha 1551 Nearby Attractions Keri Beach Redi Ganpati Temple How To Reach Terekhol fort can be reached easily by hiring a taxi or an auto from any place in the north of Goa Entry Fee No entry fee
3.summary: Reis Mogos Fort, constructed in 1551 by Portuguese Viceroy Alfonso de Noronha, is located 7 kilometers from the Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand on the banks of the Mandovi River in Verem, Bardez, Goa. The fort was reconstructed in 1707 and played a significant role in the Portuguese-Maratha wars. It is accessible by taxi or auto from northern Goa and does not charge an entry fee. Nearby attractions include Keri Beach and Redi Ganpati Temple. The fort is open daily from morning to evening.

4.context: Cabo De Rama Fort Mythological Site Trinidade for Wikipedia Another one on our list of must visit places in Goa is the Cabo De Rama Fort Popularly known by the name Cape of Rama this fort is known for its historical as well as mythological significance This fort was reconstructed by the Portuguese in the year 1763 after they seized it from the Maratha King of Sonda This tourist site is located 60 kilometers from Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand and lies in South Goa Location Taluka Cabo da Rama Canacona Goa Timings 9 AM PM all days of the week Built By Portuguese Nearby Attractions Kakolem Beach Agonda Beach How To Reach You can reach the fort easily from any of the major hubs in south Goa via public transport Entry Fee No entry fee Suggested Read 8 Beaches In Lebanon
4.summary: Cabo De Rama Fort, also known as Cape of Rama, is a historically and mythologically significant site in South Goa. Reconstructed by the Portuguese in 1763 after capturing it from the Maratha King of Sonda, the fort is situated 60 kilometers from the Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand in Taluka Cabo da Rama, Canacona. The fort is easily accessible via public transport from major hubs in South Goa and is open daily with no entry fee. Nearby attractions include Kakolem Beach and Agonda Beach.

5.context: Corjuem Fort Offers Excellent Panoramic Views Corjuem Fort is one of the smaller forts in Goa It offers a great panoramic view of the surrounding beauties Being one of the popular Goa destinations it is a spot for architecture enthusiasts and history lovers With its two inland forts it is among those places which have survived into the 21st century Location Corjuem North Goa Timings AM 7 PM 1705 Built By Portuguese Nearby Attractions Aguada Fort Calangute Beach How To Reach The fort is well connected by road Entry Fee No entry fee Churches In Goa Churches of Goa will bring you closer to the religious historical as well as architectural aspects of this Indian state Listed below are a few churches here that you must explore for a memorable trip
5.summary: Corjuem Fort, one of the smaller forts in Goa, offers excellent panoramic views of the surrounding area. Built in 1705 by the Portuguese, it is a popular destination for architecture enthusiasts and history lovers. Located in North Goa, the fort is well-connected by road and free to enter. Nearby attractions include Aguada Fort and Calangute Beach. The fort is open daily from early morning to evening.

6.context: Bom Jesus Basilica Baroque Architecture Bikashrd for Wikipedia One of the tourist places in Goa is the Bom Jesus Basilica Characterized by Baroque architecture and fine detailing carved from basalt embellishments it is one of the richest facades in Goa This is one of the best Goa tourist places to indulge in some tranquility Location Old Goa Rd Bainguinim Goa 403402 Timings Monday to Saturday AM to PM Sunday AM to PM Built By Portuguese How To Reach It is located around 10 km from Panjim in Old Goa You can hire a taxi from Panjim to reach here in around 20 minutes Entry Fee No entry fee Suggested Read 32 Hidden Places In Goa
6.summary: Bom Jesus Basilica, located on Old Goa Road in Bainguinim, Goa, is renowned for its Baroque architecture and detailed basalt embellishments. Built by the Portuguese, it is one of the richest facades in Goa and offers a tranquil experience for visitors. The basilica is situated about 10 km from Panjim and can be reached by a 20-minute taxi ride. It is open daily, with no entry fee, making it a must-visit site for those exploring Goa.

7.context: Se Cathedral Largest Asian Church Danny Burke for Wikipedia This church is known to be one of the largest Asian churches One of the major Old Goa tourist places this cathedral is established facing the Basilica of Bom Jesus Se Cathedral has even been recorded as one of the UNESCO World Heritage Sites and that too for all the right reasons This cathedral has been established as a tribute to St Catherine and is considered to be the Archdiocese s seat in Goa Location Velha Goa Timings 7 AM PM Built By Julião Simão Built In How To Reach The church is at a distance of 9 km from Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand and can be easily reached by road Entry Fee No entry fee
7.summary: Se Cathedral, located in Velha Goa, is one of the largest churches in Asia and a major tourist attraction. Facing the Basilica of Bom Jesus, it has been recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Built by Julião Simão as a tribute to St. Catherine, it serves as the Archdiocese's seat in Goa. The cathedral is 9 km from the Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand and can be easily reached by road. It is open daily with no entry fee.

8.context: Church Of St Francis Of Assisi World s 2nd Largest Bell Dey sandip for Wikimedia Commons Goa has some of the most grand and elaborately designed churches of India The Church Of St Francis Of Assisi in Panjim is one among the oldest churches in Goa A highlight of this place of worship is the statue of Mother Mary that has been installed right in front The tower forms a striking backdrop to this statue The church also preserves world s 2nd largest bell making it one of the famous places to visit in Goa Location Off National Highway 4 Goa Velha Goa Timings 7 AM PM Built By Portuguese 1661 How To Reach The church can be easily reached by road Entry Fee No entry fee Suggested Read Goa Carnival
8.summary: The Church Of St Francis Of Assisi, located off National Highway 4 in Goa Velha, Panjim, is one of the oldest and most elaborately designed churches in Goa. It features a statue of Mother Mary with a striking backdrop of the tower and houses the world's 2nd largest bell. Built by the Portuguese in 1661, the church is easily accessible by road and has no entry fee. It is open daily from morning to evening.

9.context: Church Of St Cajetan Stunning White Structure Jupitus Smart for Wikimedia Commons Church Of St Cajetan is a charming Roman Catholic church in Old Goa It is also known as Church of Divine Providence Completed in 1661 this building has been brought under the UNESCO World Heritage Site Churches and Convents of Goa making it an unmissable part of every Goa sightseeing tour The stunning white structure has large dome and inscriptions of Latin on its walls Designed in the shape of a Greek cross this architectural beauty is located close to the Mandovi River Location Old Goa Rd Bainguinim Goa 403402 Timings 7 AM PM Built By Portuguese 1661 How To Reach The church is by road Entry Fee No entry fee Iconic Places to Visit in Goa To Have Your Meal You must have visited Goa several times but here are a few iconic places to visit in Goa to experience eating out in altogether a different way While some of these offer the most picturesque sunset others will make you fall in love with their vibrance and ambience
9.summary: The Church Of St Cajetan, also known as the Church of Divine Providence, is a stunning Roman Catholic church in Old Goa. Completed in 1661 and recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site, it features a large dome and Latin inscriptions on its walls, designed in the shape of a Greek cross. Located close to the Mandovi River on Old Goa Road in Bainguinim, Goa, the church is easily accessible by road and has no entry fee. It is a must-visit for its architectural beauty and historical significance.

10.context: Thalassa Restaurant Epicurean s Delight One of the most famous restaurants amongst regular Goa tourists Thalassa offers the perfect sunset view in Goa Look for a table outside if you want to have the ideal experience at this place The clear view of the expansive sea makes it certainly worth every penny Location Plot No 301 1 Vaddy Siolim Goa 403517 Timings AM all days of the week How To Reach The place is by road Price For Two INR 2000 Suggested Read 10 Guest Houses In Goa
10.summary: Thalassa Restaurant, located at Plot No 301, 1 Vaddy, Siolim, Goa, is a popular dining spot offering the perfect sunset view in Goa. Known for its clear view of the expansive sea, it is a favorite among regular tourists. Open all days of the week, the restaurant is easily accessible by road. With a price for two around INR 2000, Thalassa provides an ideal experience for those looking to enjoy a meal with a scenic backdrop.

11.context: The Fisherman s Wharf For Seafood Lovers This place has been attracting crowds for years now While Salcette offers a decor and serves delicious tandoori pomfret masala fried prawns and fish curry rice Live performances add up to the fun at this beautiful place On Sundays you can enjoy the live performances during lunch hours as well The view of backwaters make the moments memorable for lifetime So next time you are in Goa don t forget to add this to your list of places to visit in Goa Location Behind The Leela Mobor Cavelossim Goa Timings AM all days of the week How To Reach The place is by road Price For Two INR 1500
11.summary: The Fisherman's Wharf, located behind The Leela in Mobor, Cavelossim, Goa, is a popular spot for seafood lovers. Known for its delicious tandoori pomfret, masala fried prawns, and fish curry rice, the restaurant offers a charming decor and live performances, especially during Sunday lunch hours. The scenic view of the backwaters adds to the memorable experience. Open all days of the week, the restaurant is easily accessible by road, with a price for two around INR 1500.

12.context: Anteras Vagator Meals Antares Restaurant Beach Club for Facebook Antares is a place to be if you are looking for some of the best of Goa famous places Have a meal and wait till the sunset for an experience of its kind You can pick anything from their authentic delicacies and you will not regret for the fact that their staff pours in immense creativity and dedication in each dish they serve Location Small Vagator Beach Ozran Vagator Goa Timings AM all days of the week How To Reach The place is by road Price For Two INR 2000 Suggested Read Camping In Goa Famous Party Hubs In Goa After all what is Goa without the party clubs These places to visit in Goa are not just places but rather an integral part of your itinerary They ensure you make the most of your trip to Goa and satisfy your party animal
12.summary: Antares, located at Small Vagator Beach, Ozran, Vagator, Goa, is a must-visit spot for a memorable meal and sunset experience. Known for its authentic delicacies crafted with creativity and dedication, the restaurant offers an unforgettable dining experience. Open all days of the week, it is easily accessible by road, with a price for two around INR 2000. Antares is a perfect spot to enjoy the vibrant ambiance and scenic views of Goa.

13.context: Tito s Club Celebrity DJ s shbs for Pixabay The biggest entertainment hub in Goa hosts a steady stream of high profile and celebrity DJ s with a huge dance floor and is amongst the best tourist attractions in Goa The club also features a variety of special acts dance performances and has the most versatile bartenders with fire acts and crazy bar flaring acts of their own The club within a few months of opening its doors has already received the Times Nightlife Award for the Best Nightclub in Goa Location Titos Ln Near Baga Beach Saunta Vaddo Calangute Goa Timings 6 PM 3 AM How To Reach The place is by road Price For Two INR
13.summary: Tito's Club, located on Tito's Lane near Baga Beach, Saunta Vaddo, Calangute, Goa, is the biggest entertainment hub in the region. Known for hosting high-profile and celebrity DJs, the club features a huge dance floor, special acts, dance performances, and versatile bartenders with fire and bar flaring acts. It has won the Times Nightlife Award for Best Nightclub in Goa. Open from 6 PM to 3 AM, the club is easily accessible by road.

14.context: Mambo s Craziest Party Place charlyfer for Pixabay It is one of the most happening tourist places in North Goa that has changed the clubbing scene in Goa and is among the craziest Goa places to visit It club opens from 9pm onwards and is a chilled out zone to meet friends and catch up for a drink With amazing in house DJs as well as renowned International DJ s playing all sorts of music Cafe Mambo also has special theme nights for retro music as well as trance night and also host many of the festivals in Goa Location Titos Lane Baga Beach Goa 403516 Timings 6 PM 4 AM How To Reach The place is by road Price For Two INR Suggested Read 5 Things To Do In Goa In May
14.summary: Mambo's, located on Tito's Lane at Baga Beach, Goa, is one of the most happening tourist spots in North Goa, known for transforming the local clubbing scene. The club opens from 9 PM onwards, offering a relaxed atmosphere to meet friends and enjoy a drink. It features in-house DJs, renowned international DJs, and special theme nights for retro and trance music, along with hosting various festivals. Open from 6 PM to 4 AM, Mambo's is easily accessible by road.

15.context: Britto s Tantalizing Bites Brittos Restaurant for Facebook De Baga Deck is a Italian restaurant that serves some of the most scrumptious and tantalizing food in Goa Tasty cocktails great music pleasing ambience and magical cuisines are the highlights of De Baga Deck The ambience is unique given the large French windows through which you can enjoy uninterrupted and spectacular views of the Arabian Sea De Baga Deck is open throughout the year It specializes in seafood and and you can gorge on Goan delicacies to your heart s content after you re exhausted from Goa sightseeing Location House No 7 171 Calangute Baga Rd Saunta Vaddo Baga Goa Timings AM 12 AM How To Reach The place is by road Price For Two INR Wildlife Sanctuaries in Goa If wildlife fascinates you then these amazing sanctuaries are some of the essential places to visit in Goa to make your trip more fulfilling and memorable
15.summary: Britto's, located at House No 7/171, Calangute-Baga Rd, Saunta Vaddo, Baga, Goa, is an Italian restaurant known for its scrumptious food, tasty cocktails, great music, and pleasing ambiance. The restaurant features large French windows offering spectacular views of the Arabian Sea. Open year-round, Britto's specializes in seafood and Goan delicacies, making it an ideal spot to relax after sightseeing in Goa. Easily accessible by road, it is open from morning until midnight.

16.context: Cotigao Wildlife Sanctuary Goa s Second Largest Wildlife Reserve Vikram2784 for Wikipedia Noted as Goa s Second Largest Wildlife Reserve Cotigao Wildlife Sanctuary may not be the place to see wild animals prowling but you get to see something different Sloth Bears Laughing Hyenas and Indian Bisons are a part of the community along with Monkeys and the Malabar Crested Eagle Find yourself walking in the woods and enjoying the silence that descends on this sanctuary This is one of the best places to explore in Goa to witness the intriguing wildlife Location Canacona Taluka Khotigao Goa 403702 Timings AM all days of the week How To Reach You can hire a cab or taxi from Panaji Distance From Goa 60 Kms south of Panaji Suggested Read 13 Offbeat Things To Do In Old Goa
16.summary: Cotigao Wildlife Sanctuary, Goa's second-largest wildlife reserve, offers a unique experience with sightings of Sloth Bears, Laughing Hyenas, Indian Bisons, Monkeys, and the Malabar Crested Eagle. This serene sanctuary, located in Canacona Taluka, is ideal for nature walks and enjoying the tranquility. It is about 60 km south of Panaji and can be reached by cab or taxi. The sanctuary is open all day and is a great spot to explore Goa's intriguing wildlife.

17.context: Salim Ali Bird Sanctuary Mangrove Forests Salim Ali Bird Sanctuary on western extreme of The Chorao Island is where mangrove forests are worth exploring with the presence of species like mudskipper and black drongo Named after an Indian ornithologist the sanctuary is a nice escape into wilderness This is one of the best places in Goa Location Chorao Island Ilhas Ribandar Goa Timings 6 AM 6 PM How To Reach You can hire a cab or taxi from Panaji Distance From Goa 58 Km
17.summary: Salim Ali Bird Sanctuary, located on Chorao Island, is a prime spot in Goa for exploring mangrove forests and observing species like the mudskipper and black drongo. Named after the renowned Indian ornithologist, the sanctuary provides a serene escape into the wilderness. It is open from 6 AM to 6 PM and is about 58 km from Panaji, accessible by cab or taxi.

18.context: Wildlife Sanctuary Rarest Of Species sarangib for Pixabay Wildlife Sanctuary is Goa s most visited sanctuary and that is not without reason Like other Wildlife Sanctuaries in Goa attends to a host of species You can spot the from the rarest of species of Kandelia Candel to a wide range of Birds Snakes Jackals and Crocodiles Location Chorao Island Ilhas Ribandar Goa Timings 6 AM 6 PM How To Reach You can hire a cab or taxi from Panaji Distance From Goa NA Suggested Read Goa Carnival
18.summary: The Wildlife Sanctuary on Chorao Island is Goa's most visited sanctuary, known for hosting a diverse range of species, including the rare Kandelia Candel, various birds, snakes, jackals, and crocodiles. Open from 6 AM to 6 PM, it is accessible by cab or taxi from Panaji.

19.context: Bhagwan Mahavir Wildlife Sanctuary Largest Wildlife Sanctuaries In Goa Dinesh Valke for Wikipedia This wildlife sanctuary is a part of Mollem Village which is located in Sanguem Taluka Earlier it was known by the name Mollem Game Sanctuary and it was in the year 1969 that it was given the name Bhagwan Mahavir Wildlife Sanctuary This sanctuary is considered to be the largest in the four wildlife sanctuaries of Goa this sanctuary also covers within it the mesmerising Mollem National Park Location Goa 403410 Timings AM How To Reach You can hire a cab or taxi from Panaji Distance From Goa 10 km from Panaji
19.summary: Bhagwan Mahavir Wildlife Sanctuary, located in Mollem Village, Sanguem Taluka, is the largest of Goa's four wildlife sanctuaries. Renamed in 1969, it encompasses the Mollem National Park and offers diverse wildlife experiences. The sanctuary is approximately 10 km from Panaji and can be reached by cab or taxi.

20.context: Bondla Wildlife Sanctuary Smallest Wildlife Sanctuaries In Goa Bondla Wildlife Sanctuary is the smallest wildlife sanctuary in Goa and is amongst the popular Goa tourist places Besides seeing a variety of flora and fauna species here you can explore the deer safari park botanical gardens and more A famous place among photography enthusiasts children and environmentalists this wildlife sanctuary can be visited throughout the year Location VP Goa 403105 Timings 9AM to 5PM Monday closed How To Reach You can hire a cab or taxi from Panaji Distance From Goa 34 Km Suggested Read 15 Casinos In Goa Shopping Places In Goa To satiate your shopaholism you must visit the vibrant markets of Goa that are known for their wide varieties of clothes and accessories Explore the markets mentioned below
20.summary: Bondla Wildlife Sanctuary, the smallest in Goa, is a popular destination for its diverse flora and fauna, deer safari park, and botanical gardens. A favorite among photographers, children, and environmentalists, it is open year-round except on Mondays from 9 AM to 5 PM. Located 34 km from Panaji, it can be reached by cab or taxi.

21.context: Mapusa Market Famous Shopping Destination Mapusa is one of the many famous shopping destinations in Goa Just outside Mapusa Municipal Market you will find an array of stalls enticing you with local goods got by farmers and small entrepreneurs across the state You can shop for several artifacts clothes accessories souvenirs and much more at the market while shopping in Goa Location Mapusa Market Area Panaji Goa Timings 6 AM 8 PM What To Buy Clothes accessories souvenirs
21.summary: Mapusa Market, a famous shopping destination in Goa, offers a variety of local goods from farmers and small entrepreneurs, including artifacts, clothes, accessories, and souvenirs. Located in the Mapusa Market Area near Panaji, it is open from 6 AM to 8 PM.

22.context: Saturday Night Market Popular Flea Market This sprawling market is located in Arpora One can find everything in this market right from spices to jewellery unique creations international designers vintage items and much more Apart from that it hosts live concerts A lot of hippies frequent this market and sell goodies too The Saturday night market has featured in Bollywood films too It is one of the best liveliest getaways for sightseeing in Goa This is one of the best places in Goa Location Arpora Goa Timings 6 AM 8 PM What To Buy Jewellery unique creations international designers vintage items Suggested Read 21 Shopping Destinations In India
22.summary: The Saturday Night Market in Arpora is a vibrant flea market offering spices, jewelry, unique creations, international designs, vintage items, and more. Popular with hippies and featuring live concerts, it is one of Goa's liveliest sightseeing spots and operates from 6 AM to 8 PM.

23.context: Anjuna Flea Market Favourite Hangout Among Backpackers Apart from the famous Curlies Anjuna flea market is amongst the most popular tourist places in Goa The flea market is open only on Wednesdays and offers many things right from fruits to clothes and accessories to electronic devices It s a favourite hangout among hippies and backpackers While you can find really unique items at this market give your best shot at bargaining coz you can avail some great deals Location 10 St Michael s Vaddo South Anjuna Goa 403509 Timings October to March AM AM AM AM What To Buy Souvenirs Beaches In Goa Beaches in Goa are its highlight and people from all around the country come here to spend the time of their lives and unwind themselves at the beaches Scroll down to know what s in store for you in some of the major beaches of Goa
23.summary: The Anjuna Flea Market, a popular tourist spot in Goa, operates only on Wednesdays from October to March. It's a favorite among hippies and backpackers, offering a variety of items from fruits to electronic devices. Located in St Michael's Vaddo, South Anjuna, it is known for great deals through bargaining.

24.context: Aguada Beach Delightful Views While Fort Aguada is known to soothe your eyes with delightful views of Aguada beach it allures the travellers with pristine landscape and the background of ancient citadels The beach is famous amongst honeymooners Location Fort Aguada Rd Aguada Fort Area Candolim Goa 403515 What s Special Do plan a trip to the lighthouse near by It offers some gorgeous views of the beach from a height Suggested Read 14 Things To Do In Goa In Monsoon Goa Holiday Packages On TravelTriangle Wonderful Goa Family Package Rs Plan your trip today Book Now Riveting Goa Honeymoon Package Rs Get quotes from multiple travel experts Book Now Goa with Love Sun Sand Shopping Rs Compare customize quotes before booking Book Now Best of Goa Exciting Family Vacation Rs Have Questions Talk to our travel experts today Book Now Jumbo Goa Family Holiday Package Rs Best prices guaranteed EMI option available Book Now See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE COM Visit Website
24.summary: Aguada Beach, known for its delightful views and pristine landscape, is a favorite among honeymooners. Located near Fort Aguada in Candolim, Goa, it offers gorgeous views, especially from the nearby lighthouse. The beach is a tranquil spot with historical significance.

25.context: Arambol Beach Bohemian Atmosphere With its Bohemian atmosphere Arambol has long been a tourist attraction in Goa for many of the hippies youthful backpackers The relaxed environment at the Arambol beach coupled with peace and tranquility attracts many vacationers from other beaches of Goa Location North Goa What s Special Over here one can indulge in water sports in Goa such as paragliding and kitesurfing
25.summary: Arambol Beach in North Goa is known for its Bohemian atmosphere, attracting hippies and youthful backpackers. The relaxed and tranquil environment, along with opportunities for water sports like paragliding and kitesurfing, makes it a popular destination.

26.context: Baga Beach White Sand Beach Baga Beach a famous tourist point in Goa is the centre of tourist attraction in Goa Majestic white waves rushing to wipe out the feet imprints left by you on the white sand while the wind continues to flirt with the palm trees Amongst all the activities parasailing banana boat rides and are highly enjoyed at this beach This is one of the top tourist places in Goa for couples where they can indulge in an array of fun experiences Location Bardez Goa What s Special Beach side shacks and cafes which serve you with delectable Goan delicacies and music to soothe your senses One could indulge in artificial tattoos braids too Suggested Read Don t Do Things While In Goa
26.summary: Baga Beach, a famous tourist spot in Bardez, Goa, is known for its white sand and majestic waves. Popular activities include parasailing and banana boat rides. The beach features beachside shacks and cafes serving Goan delicacies, making it a top spot for couples to enjoy various fun experiences.

27.context: Anjuna Beach Full Moon Parties One of the most popular tourist places in Goa the world renowned freak capital of the world Anjuna Beach is known for its acid house parties trance Parties and the hippies who tried to synthesize the spiritual traditions of the East and the art ideas and the music of the West Location Anjuna North Goa What s Special The beach is known for full moon parties
27.summary: Anjuna Beach in North Goa is renowned for its vibrant full moon parties, acid house, and trance parties. Known as the freak capital of the world, it attracts hippies who blend Eastern spiritual traditions with Western art and music, making it a popular tourist destination.

28.context: Butterfly Beach For Peace Seekers This beautiful Butterfly beach situated towards the north of the Palolem beach It is very suitable for those seeking peace and isolation and is one of the quietest and unexplored beaches in Goa The Butterfly beach is surrounded by a lot of rocks One can enjoy the thrilling ride by the paddle boat towards the beach and also see some dolphins on the way Location Palolem Goa What s Special The Butterfly beach is known for its clean water and a lot of tourists visit it to spot Dolphins Suggested Read 54 Best Beaches In India
28.summary: Butterfly Beach, located north of Palolem Beach, is perfect for peace seekers and those looking for isolation. This quiet and unexplored beach is surrounded by rocks, offering a thrilling paddle boat ride with opportunities to spot dolphins. It's known for its clean water and tranquility.

29.context: Calangute Beach Queen Of Beaches Divya suresh for Wikimedia Commons It is also known as the Queen of Beaches Bringing hordes of European tourist calangute beach is the haven for hippies You can also have you full of adventure with parasailing and dolphin trips It is one of the best places to visit in Goa in 2 days especially if you re travelling with friends alone or with your partner Location Calangute Goa What s Special With a nightlife bustling flea markets and generous contributions of history you can let your spirits scale high on the sky of experience
29.summary: Calangute Beach, also known as the Queen of Beaches, attracts many European tourists and is a haven for hippies. Known for its bustling nightlife, flea markets, and historical significance, it offers adventure activities like parasailing and dolphin trips. It's a must-visit for friends, solo travelers, or couples.

30.context: Colva Beach Largest And Oldest Beach This beach is located 33 kilometres away from the Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand and is at a distance of 8 kilometers from the Margao Railway Station This beach of South Goa is considered to be one of the tourist attractions This beach is considered to be the largest and oldest amongst the beaches lying in the southern region of Goa and is also counted amongst the best places to visit in Goa for couples Location Colva Goa What s Special Colva Beach is famous for its pubs and bars and all the party lovers must head to this beach to have a lit night Suggested Read Shoot In Goa
30.summary: Colva Beach, located in South Goa, is the largest and oldest beach in the region. Situated 33 km from Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand and 8 km from Margao Railway Station, it's a popular tourist attraction known for its pubs and bars. It's a great spot for couples and party lovers.

31.context: Cansaulim Beach Second Largest Coastline Stretch In India This beach along with Arossim and Cuelim form the second largest coastline stretch in the entire country of India Cansaulim Beach is considered to be an extended part of Velsao Beach and is among the most charming picnic spots in Goa This particular beach is known for its white sands and various palm trees It forms a part of the northernmost tip of Velsao Beach one of the most scenic Goa destinations If you want to explore the secluded beaches of Goa then visiting this one is a must Location Cansaulim Goa What s Special Click some incredible shots with palm trees in the background and take a long walk around the beach
31.summary: Cansaulim Beach, part of the second-largest coastline stretch in India along with Arossim and Cuelim, is a charming picnic spot known for its white sands and palm trees. Located at the northern tip of Velsao Beach in Goa, it offers scenic views and is perfect for exploring secluded beaches and capturing incredible photos.

32.context: Benaulim Beach Indulge In Water Sport Activities ELG21 for Pixabay Located very close to Colva Beach Benaulim Beach is a great beach with plenty of things to do apart from sitting back and relaxing Indulge in various water sporting activities like jet skiing parasailing and wind surfing Go on a candlelit romantic beach dinner or enjoy sightseeing froma range of options Sernabatim Lake Ramola Super Market Sernabatim Beach Copelwaddo Chapel St Anthonys Church It is one of the best places to visit in Goa Location Cansaulim Goa What s Special Enjoy candlelit dinners at beach side restaurants like The Farmhouse Restaurant Li Bai Dinha s Restaurant and The Pavilion Suggested Read 20 Honeymoon Resorts In Goa
32.summary: Benaulim Beach, near Colva Beach, offers various activities like jet skiing, parasailing, and windsurfing. It is also ideal for romantic candlelit beach dinners and sightseeing. Located in Cansaulim, Goa, it is one of the best places to visit for a mix of relaxation and adventure.

33.context: Dona Paula Beach Popular For Thrilling Activities SahilSahadevan for Wikimedia Commons Counted among the best tourist places to visit in Goa Dona Paula Beach has a tragic history that is related to both love suicide The beach gives a lot of options for sport activities to indulge in for adventurous souls If you wish to get pretty views of the Arabia Sea then you must head to the jetty that is right next to the beach Location Dona Paula Beach What s special Watersports like water skiing windsurfing parasailing etc
33.summary: Dona Paula Beach, known for its tragic love story, offers various thrilling water sports like water skiing, windsurfing, and parasailing. It provides beautiful views of the Arabian Sea, especially from the nearby jetty, making it a popular tourist destination in Goa.

34.context: Ashvem Beach Find Your Secluded Spot Raya Sharbain for Wikimedia Commons Another one on the list of Goa sightseeing places is Ashvem Beach which can be found in the Mandrem village North Goa Tall palm trees lined on an extensive white sand define this beach perfectly If you are in search of some secluded spots on beaches of Goa then you must visit Ashvem Beach and find your place to relax You can also relish some seafood from the restaurants on the beach Location Ashvem Beach Goa 403512 What s special Try exotic dishes from the shacks on the beach like La Cucina S2 Beach Shack Paradise Beach Shack and Cafe Sea Green Back Shack Suggested Read 16 Places To Visit In Goa In May
34.summary: Ashvem Beach, located in Mandrem village, North Goa, is perfect for those seeking secluded spots. Defined by tall palm trees and extensive white sand, it offers a relaxing atmosphere and exotic seafood from beach shacks like La Cucina and Paradise Beach Shack.

35.context: Mobor Beach A Piece Of Heaven Bistaastha for Wikimedia Commons You must have heard of Mobor Beach when going through any list of top places to visit in Goa this is because it is one of the most exotic beaches in South Goa It is thronged by several tourists every year which creates a cool surrounding with people dancing and going crazy over the views A look at it and you will realize that is a piece of heaven that you were unaware of before Location Mobor Beach Goa What s special Do not forget to explore nearby places like Betul Fort Lighthouse
35.summary: Mobor Beach in South Goa is known for its exotic beauty and lively atmosphere, attracting numerous tourists each year. It offers a vibrant environment with people dancing and enjoying the scenic views. Nearby attractions include Betul Fort and Lighthouse.

36.context: Sinquerim Beach Ideal For Families Friends IM3847 for Wikimedia Commons How can a list of the best Goa tourist places remain complete without Sinquerim Beach in it So here is the Sinquerim Beach with an amazing shoreline and perfect views that can make anyone fall in love with this place If you are traveling with your friends or families then you must head to this beach which is perfect for swimming and a few water activities Location Sinquerim Candolim Goa 403515 What s special If you are a party person then you must head to the Sinc Nightclub where you can shake your legs with your gang Suggested Read 13 Places To Visit In Goa In June
36.summary: Sinquerim Beach in Candolim, Goa, is perfect for families and friends, offering an amazing shoreline and views. Ideal for swimming and water activities, it also features the Sinc Nightclub for party enthusiasts. It's a must-visit for a mix of relaxation and fun.

37.context: Querim Beach Away From The Humdrums Of Citylife Jo Kent for Wikimedia Commons Also popular as Keri Beach Querim Beach lies in the northern region or Goa and is the largest one in the area You might find popular beaches in Goa thronging with tourists and locals at that time you can head to this beach and spend some time in calm surroundings People usually love this place due to its unkempt crops and beaches which is why they are in the purest form which is why it is one of the best places to visit in Goa Location Querim Beach Goa 403519 What s special You can also opt for water activities like surfing paragliding banana ride and kayaking Islands In Goa If you re a nature lover then these islands are your type of places to visit in Goa Look at the ones listed below and make the most of it
37.summary: Querim Beach, also known as Keri Beach, is the largest beach in North Goa, offering a peaceful retreat away from crowded spots. Known for its natural beauty and unkempt crops, it is perfect for relaxing and water activities like surfing, paragliding, banana rides, and kayaking.

38.context: Chorao Island Largest Island In Goa Chorao Island is true to its Sanskrit name meaning Stunning Precious Stone From being a mere settlement of Portuguese noblemen this Goan Island has grown into a quaint place nurturing few church and aged villas Being the Largest Island in Goa Chorao Island surpasses 16 other islands in attracting visitors which is why it is one of the top Goa tourist places Location Near Panjim Goa What s Special It is amongst the most tranquil places in Goa Suggested Read Travel Guide To Goa
38.summary: Chorao Island, the largest island in Goa, is known for its tranquil atmosphere and historical significance. Originally a settlement of Portuguese noblemen, it now attracts visitors with its churches and aged villas. Located near Panjim, it is a serene getaway in Goa.

39.context: Divar Island Impeccable Beauty Divar Island is still untouched by commercialization and it has retained much of its originality One of the best places to visit in Goa with friends this small village reprises the feeling of visiting Goan countryside Bonderam is a much talked about festival which sees a huge influx of tourists to Divar Island Another one of the best tourist places to visit in Goa this should definitely make to your next Goa itinerary Location Mandovi river Goa What s Special Situated across the Mandovi River it is easily accessible via ferry from near Viceroy s Arch and is among the best places to visit in Old Goa
39.summary: Divar Island, located across the Mandovi River, retains its original charm and is ideal for visiting with friends. Known for the Bonderam festival, it offers a taste of the Goan countryside. Accessible via ferry from Viceroy's Arch, it is one of the best places to visit in Old Goa.

40.context: Grand Island Offbeat Spot Grand Island is true to its name It is amongst the most offbeat yet adventurous tourist places in Goa It offers a grand experience to the lovers of watersports as it is home to excellent Scuba Diving sites Visiting this island is undoubtedly one of the best offbeat things to do in Goa Location Sautavaddo Calangute Goa 403516 What s Special Suzy s Wreck Shelter Cove and Bounty Bay are some of the Scuba Diving sites around Grand Island Take a day trip to this island in Goa for great snorkelling experience Suggested Read 20 Beaches In South Goa Other Places To Visit In Goa All the places will make you want to come back to this place However when planning your trip here don t forget to add the places for a comprehensive fun ensuring you don t miss out on anything
40.summary: Grand Island is an adventurous and offbeat spot in Goa, known for its excellent scuba diving sites like Suzy's Wreck, Shelter Cove, and Bounty Bay. Located in Sautavaddo, Calangute, it offers a grand experience for watersports enthusiasts and is one of the best offbeat activities in Goa.

41.context: Archives Museum Illuminating Hours StockSnap for Pixabay The Museum of Goa is housed at a new building at the Patto Plaza near the ourem creek Panaji and is another one of the best tourist places to visit in Goa There are about eight thousand interesting artefacts housed in this museum which makes this place one of the top places to see in Goa Location Ourem Road Rua de Ourém Mala Panaji Goa What s Special The museum is home to over eight thousand interesting artefacts
41.summary: The Museum of Goa, located at Patto Plaza near the ourem creek in Panaji, is a top tourist destination housing around eight thousand interesting artefacts. It offers an illuminating experience and is one of the best places to visit in Goa for history and culture enthusiasts.

42.context: Panaji The Capital City The capital another popular tourist place in Goa lies on the southern left bank of the Mandovi River that skirts the town and makes for a beautiful setting Without a doubt it s one of the best places to visit in Goa with family Panaji is best discovered on foot as you walk in the lanes past heritage houses by the market selling an amazing range of goodies Location North Goa What s Special A boat cruise through the River Mandovi at night is one of the best experiences you ll ever have on the serene waters of Goa Suggested Read Cruise Vacations In India
42.summary: Panaji, the capital city of Goa, is situated on the southern left bank of the Mandovi River and offers a beautiful setting. It's one of the best places to visit in Goa with family, best explored on foot. A night boat cruise through the Mandovi River is a must-have experience.

43.context: Dudhsagar Waterfalls Enticing Sights Purshi for Wikipedia This waterfall is quite famous all over India owing to the falls Moreover this is one of the tallest waterfalls in the country The height of Dudhsagar Waterfalls is 1017 feet and is 100 feet wide on an average at the peak Bhagwan Mahavir Sanctuary is where these falls are lying almost at the border between Goa and Karnataka The distance between these falls and Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand is 71 kilometers Location Sonaulim Goa 403410 What s Special This is amongst the most refreshing escapes and is ideal to plan a family picnic
43.summary: Dudhsagar Waterfalls, one of the tallest waterfalls in India at 1017 feet, is located in Bhagwan Mahavir Sanctuary near the Goa-Karnataka border. It is a popular tourist spot known for its enticing sights and is ideal for a refreshing family picnic. The falls are 71 km from Panjim Kadamba Bus Stand.

44.context: Shri Mangeshi Temple Major Pilgrimage Site Aruna for Wikipedia It is situated at a distance of 37 kilometres from the Vasco Da Gama Railway Station This temple is considered to be one of the most prominent attractions in North Goa It is one of the places in Goa as it is a major pilgrimage site here The temple is also considered to be the largest and richest Hindu shrines in the Indian state of Goa Thus Shri Mangeshi Temple is definitely one of the places in Goa Location Dinanath Mangeshkar Rd Mangeshi Village Mardol Goa 403401 What s Special This is amongst the prominent religious sites Suggested Read New Year Parties In Goa
44.summary: Shri Mangeshi Temple, located 37 km from Vasco Da Gama Railway Station, is one of the most prominent attractions and major pilgrimage sites in North Goa. It is considered the largest and richest Hindu shrine in Goa, making it a significant religious destination.

45.context: Shri Shantadurga Temple Spiritual Visit Nkodikal for Wikipedia This temple is one of the biggest and most frequented temples in Goa As the name suggests this temple is devoted to Shantadurga the Goddess of Peace On a less formal note the Goddess is also referred to as Santeri This temple is one of the prominent locations in North Goa Hence if you seek divinity visit this iconic temple Location Kapileswari Kavlem Rd Donshiwado Ponda Goa 403401 What s Special The temple is popular amongst locals
45.summary: Shri Shantadurga Temple, devoted to the Goddess of Peace, Shantadurga, is one of the biggest and most frequented temples in North Goa. Also known as Santeri, this iconic temple is a prominent location for those seeking divinity and is popular among locals.

46.context: Shri Mahalaxmi Temple Celebrate Auspiciousness Deepak Patil for Wikimedia Commons This temple is located in Bandora Village and lies at a distance of 4 kilometers from Ponda It has been established in devotion to Mahalaxmi the consort of Lord Vishnu The highlight of this temple is that the idol of Devi has been depicted wearing linga on her head Location Mushtifund Saunthan Panaji Dada Vaidhya Road Panaji Goa 403001 What s Special The religious site that welcomes pilgrims throughout the year Suggested Read 9 Best Islands Of Goa
46.summary: Shri Mahalaxmi Temple, located in Bandora Village 4 km from Ponda, is devoted to Mahalaxmi, the consort of Lord Vishnu. The temple features an idol of Devi wearing a linga on her head and is a significant religious site welcoming pilgrims throughout the year.

47.context: Candolim Beach Hub Of Adventure Freaks Jasir Hamim for Wikimedia Commons Another beautiful place to visit in Goa is Candolim Beach This is a hub of adventure freaks holidaying here in Goa as it offers an array of daring water sports You can even rent out a scooter here and drive with your friends to Fort Aguada which is located on the other side of Calangute Beach You can also relax by the beach or capture the mesmerizing views of sunsets and sunrises in your camera Location Calangute Beach What s Special Mesmerizing views of sunsets and sunrises
47.summary: Candolim Beach, a hub for adventure enthusiasts in Goa, offers daring water sports and scooter rentals for trips to nearby Fort Aguada. Visitors can relax on the beach and capture mesmerizing views of sunsets and sunrises, making it a beautiful place to visit in Goa.

48.context: Tito s Street Best Nightlife Experience Tito s Street is home to some of the most electrifying clubs in Goa The place offers you an array of clubs in the prime location of Goa Once the sunsets you will see numerous party freaks in the town heading to Tito s Street to have the best nightlife experience of Goa The place also offers scrumptious delicacies and is a heaven for shopaholics staying in Goa Location Titos Ln Baga What s Special Scrumptious delicacies Suggested Read Hotels In Panjim
48.summary: Tito's Street in Baga is renowned for its electrifying nightlife, hosting some of Goa's best clubs. It's a prime location for party enthusiasts and offers delicious food and shopping opportunities, making it a popular spot for nightlife and entertainment.

49.context: Palolem Beach Gorgeous Escape Nico Crisafulli for Wikimedia Commons Palolem Beach in Goa is amongst the most gorgeous beaches in Goa During day time the beach gets crowded with numerous hawkers offering delicious seafood and other decorative items This is a significant Goa tourist attraction and offers mesmerizing views If you are a and love experience the true vibe of the destination you are visiting then you must surely head to this beach on your Goa vacation Location Market town of Chaudi in South Goa What s Special Mesmerizing views
49.summary: Palolem Beach, located in the market town of Chaudi in South Goa, is one of the most gorgeous beaches in Goa. It attracts numerous hawkers offering seafood and decorative items during the day. Known for its mesmerizing views, it is a significant tourist attraction in Goa.

50.context: Casino Cruise Enthralling Experience If you are on a luxurious holiday to Goa then you must surely visit Casino Cruise This stay will give a to your enthralling vacation in Goa The cruise is docked on a popular river in Goa and this posh furnishing cruise offers spellbinding views during day and come to life at 9 pm when the DJ night starts and continues till 3 am in the morning It is one of the places in Goa Location NA What s Special Luxurious getaway Suggested Read 5 Guest Houses In Panjim
50.summary: Casino Cruise in Goa offers a luxurious and enthralling experience. Docked on a popular river, it provides spellbinding views during the day and vibrant DJ nights from 9 pm to 3 am. It's a must-visit for those seeking a luxurious getaway in Goa.

51.context: The Church Of Our Lady Of Immaculate Conception Peaceful Hours Ronit ghosh04 for Wikimedia Commons It is amongst the most visited churches in Goa and this beautiful church stands tall in the capital city of Goa The church was established in the year 1541 as a chapel and later in the year 1619 the larger building was constructed The church played a significant role in life of Old Portuguese sailors and has always remained a significant landmark in the history of Goa Its multicolored interior is one of its kinds and imparts peace and delight to its visitors Location Rua Emídio Garcia Altinho Panaji Goa 403001 What s Special Exclusive architecture
51.summary: The Church of Our Lady of Immaculate Conception, located in Panaji, Goa, is one of the most visited churches in the state. Established in 1541 and expanded in 1619, it played a significant role for Portuguese sailors. Known for its unique multicolored interior, it imparts peace and delight to its visitors.

52.context: Club Cubana Dazzling Ambiance Pexels for Pixabay Club Cabana is amongst the most popular clubs in Goa and is known for its amazing nightlife experiences They call themselves the Nightclub in the Sky and offer parties that will surely take your vacation to the next level If you are a holidaying in Goa and looking for the most electrifying party then you must surely head to Club Cabana with your friends or travel partner Location Aguada Siolim Rd Arpora Goa 403507 What s Special One of the best nightclubs in Goa Suggested Read 3 Days In Goa
52.summary: Club Cubana, known as the 'Nightclub in the Sky,' is one of the most popular clubs in Goa, offering dazzling ambiance and electrifying parties. Located in Arpora, it promises to take your vacation to the next level with amazing nightlife experiences.

53.context: Lamgau Caves Interesting Cave Tama66 for Pixabay Looking for some popular North Goa tourist places Lamgau caves can be a good pick This cave is very interesting and is visited by people from across the world It is an important place for the Hindu community and not only it is a great tourist destination but also a renowned educational and cultural sites Location Bicholim North Goa What s Special An interesting cave
53.summary: Lamgau Caves in Bicholim, North Goa, are an interesting tourist destination visited by people worldwide. Important for the Hindu community, these caves are also renowned educational and cultural sites, making them a significant attraction in North Goa.

54.context: Arvalem Waterfall Scenic Waterfall Not as enormous as the Dudhsagar waterfalls but Arvalem Waterfall is also one of the best places to visit in Goa Visiting this attraction during the monsoon months is the best time to enjoy the splendid sight Participate in the activities located close by To reach this gorgeous attraction there is a lot of transportation available from Panaji Location Mapusa North Goa What s Special Amongst the most splendid sights in Goa Further Read Goa vs Gokarna Best Places To Visit In Goa Goa is indeed a paradise for the water sports and activities You will be basking in the beautiful sunshine and engaged in doing adventurous activities like kite surfing knee boarding parasailing paragliding kayaking diving and snorkelling There are innumerable tourist attractions in Goa for a short vacation or weekend getaways If you are planning well in advance then you can plan your Goa trip on New Year or Goa Carnival festival which are two of the most amazing times When in Goa plan to chill in one of the trendy bars elegant cafes beach shacks Tourists can even plan to enjoy discos and clubs with friends Come experience Goa life and get amazed with what exotic it has to offer and that too within your budget Have you ever imagine there is so much in Goa Hurry up and pack yourself for such an amazing trip All the tourist places in Goa mentioned above will ensure you get a glimpse into the nature culture and history of this state A visit to a great number of places ranging from beaches to temples will make sure your trip to Goa will turn out to be a fulfilling travel experience For our editorial codes of conduct and copyright disclaimer please click here Frequently Asked Questions about Tourist Places in Goa How many days are enough for Goa No set number of days is enough for Goa as it is the kind of destination that one wouldn t want to come back from But if one is planning a trip here then they should at least plan a trip for days What are the best places to visit in Goa in 3 days In 3 days in Goa you can explore the beaches of North Goa like Baga and Anjuna visit historic sites in Old Goa and enjoy the vibrant nightlife in areas like Calangute and Candolim Which part of Goa is best for tourists The northern part of Goa is ideal for tourists offering a mix of stunning beaches historical attractions and a lively atmosphere On the other hand South Goa is a peaceful haven for tourists with its pristine beaches culture and serene environment perfect for those seeking a more relaxed experience What is the in Goa May to September marks the in Goa when the weather is hot but the beach town is comparatively less crowded You ll find all Goa tourist places to be almost empty and hotel prices will be at their lowest Is South Goa better than North Goa South Goa is comparatively serene and calm The beaches in South Goa are less crowded as North Goa is famous as the party hub If you are a sucker for a peaceful environment then South Goa is the ideal place for you Is Goa good for a family trip Although Goa is famous as a place to visit with friends or on a honeymoon one can totally plan a family trip to this happening destination Goa offers various intriguing adventures that you can enjoy with your family What are the best clubs in Goa Some of the clubs that one should visit in Goa are Tito s Bar and Club Baga Club Cubana Anjuna and LPK Love Passion Karma Waterfront Nerul If you visit North Goa then you can find more nightclubs to visit during your tour Which church is famous in Goa Some of the churches that one must visit on a trip to Goa are Basilica of Bom Jesus Bainguinim Church of Our Lady of Immaculate Conception Panaji Church of Our Lady of the Mount Ella Se Cathedral Velha Mae De Deus Church Saligao Is Ola service available in Goa No Ola or Uber isn t available in Goa but one can download the app of GoaMiles an initiative by Goa tourism for taxi services to get around and see all the major Goa destinations You can also hire a vehicle which you can use for commuting in Goa Looking To Book A Holiday Package Spellbinding Cochin Family Tour Package Rs Plan your trip today 54.summary: Arvalem Waterfall, though not as large as Dudhsagar, is one of the best places to visit in Goa, especially during the monsoon. Located in Mapusa, North Goa, it offers splendid sights and various nearby activities, making it a popular tourist destination for nature lovers.
